DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , non-randomized , single arm , multicenter observational study . The objective evaluate safety efficacy MGuard™ Prime stent treatment de novo stenotic lesion coronary artery patient undergo primary percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) due acute ST elevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) real-world setting .
